text: Avan () is a rural locality (a village) in Vyazemsky District, Khabarovsk Krai, Russia. The population was 714 .Численность населения Российской Федерации по муниципальным образованиям на 1 января 2018 года There are 13 streets. == Geography == The village is located 10 km south from Vyazemsky. == References == Category:Rural localities in Khabarovsk Krai
title: Avan, Khabarovsk Krai
